about_the_game:
Kings of Hell is a 3D Beat Em Up with Stylized Cel Shaded Graphics in the gameplay style of 3D Beat Em Ups of the Early 2000's!

Enter the World of Kings of Hell; set during 2112, 100 years after the rapture, the world as we know it is now literally Hell on Earth as Demons now rule the planet. Follow the adventures of Lutin, Enfer, Gremile and Mal as they fight the current 5 Dukes of Hell. With each Duke they defeat, they come one step closer to ruling this hellish landscape. For the one who can claim the throne, they will become...

...King of Hell!

  • Play as a large cast of Demonic Characters who each have their own unique abilities, gameplay styles and combo. Pick your initial choice of the Vigilante Rockstar Lutin Lucifer, the Gentle Giant Enfer Belial, The Gun Toting Bad Boy Gremile ‘Hot Shot’ or their Manager and Master of the Seas, Mal Leviathan, with many more characters to unlock!
  • Obliterate your enemies with a variety of crazy moves. As you thrash your foes about and increase your combo meter, you can cash out your combo to perform devastating grabs that send your opponents straight to hell!
  • Play with friends in this cooperative competitive experience where you help eachother out taking down your demonic foes whilst competing for points to claim the title of King of Hell!
  • Explore densely packed sand boxes where you can complete your objective in any manner you see fit. And with friends, you can explore together or split up to raise some hell!
  • Face off against powerful and wild demonic foes ranging from the inescapable speed demon Mercenary Buer, the master of the east and martial arts, Judge Yama, or the hulking behemoth and walking natural disaster, Duke Baal!
  • Collect plenty of unlockables during your gameplay experience such as the Trophy Viewer where you can admire the cel shaded model work, or the Sticker Gallery where you can unlock Sticker Emotes to use in game as well as painted works of art, all done by a large array of artists!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of extreme violence, gore, suggestive clothing and partial nudity.

name: Kings of Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-9750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
